short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily keep track of your school timetable directly from the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: School Time allows you to easily track what classes you have and when. It easily integrates with Sentral for schools and supports custom image themes. Setting up your timetable is quick, easy and automatic.
